recipe.title: Blueberry And Almond Instant Oatmeal Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: ¾ cup ; boiling water, or milk ; (175 mL)

steps.step: Add the instant oatmeal, freeze-dried blueberries, almonds, chia seeds, vanilla bean, and sugar into a mason jar.
Store in a cool, dry place for up to a month.
To prepare, pour boiling water or milk over oats. Stir to combine and let sit for 3 minutes.
Serve with slivered almonds and fresh blueberries.
